WorkItem.Description:
The mp5 stat is not showing correctly.  Not really sure what's going on in Rawr, but it doesn't match the calculations that Blizz is using to determine the value.
 
mp5 = (sqrt(Int) * 5 * Spirit * .005575) + <mp5 item values>
 
For example, my current stats are:
 
Int = 572
Spi = 704
mp5 items = 28 mp5
 
Plugging these into the formula yields:  498 mp5 (which matches armory)
The value showing in rawr:  306.31
 
... and for my in-combat mp5 (3/3 Intensity):
 
ic_mp5 = ((sqrt(Int) * 5 * Spirit * .005575) * .3) + mp5 items
 
... this yields:  169 ic_mp5 (which matches armory).
 
Hope this is corrected soon!  Great app!

Comments.Message: Oops, typo... the mp5 from items is wrong.  It should be 29 instead of 28.
